cyber-dojo.sh:
rm -f *.class
CLASSES=.:`ls /cucumber/*.jar | tr '\n' ':'`
javac -Xlint:unchecked -cp $CLASSES  *.java
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  java -cp $CLASSES org.junit.runner.JUnitCore `ls -1 *Test*.class | grep -v '\\$' | sed 's/\(.*\)\..*/\1/'`
fi
hear_shout.feature:
Feature: Hearing a shout

    Shouts have a range of approximately 1000 metres

    Scenario Outline: only hear in-range shouts
        Given Lucy is at 0, 0
        And Sean is at <Seans-location>
        When Sean shouts
        Then Lucy hears <who-Lucy-hears>
        
        Examples: Location examples
        |   Seans-location  |   who-Lucy-hears  |
        |   0, 900          |   Sean            |
        |   800, 800        |   nobody          |
        
    Scenario: Multiple shouters
        Given people located at
        |   name    |   x   |   y   |
        |   Lucy    |   0   |   0   |
        |   Sean    |   0   |   500 |
        |   Oscar   |   800 |   800 |
        When Sean shouts
        And Oscar shouts
        Then Lucy shouldn't hear Oscar
        But Lucy hears Sean
        
    Scenario: Don't talk to yourself
        Given Lucy is at 0, 0
        When Lucy shouts
        Then Lucy shouldn't hear Lucy
